name: Undead Survivor (SkyesCloud)
description:
UNDEAD SURVIVOR [v1.02]

Survive against endless hordes of undead creatures. 
Collect items and power-ups whilst randomly unlocking weapons.
Traverse the infinite sized world, and battle your way through the undead apocalypse.

~Particle GFX  & Save Data are not working in the Browser Edition~

Controls:
Touch / Click the Game Window to move your Player

Extras:
This game is still in early development and new updates and features are planned.

Background Music: ghostxkitty#9786 [discord]
